summary: "Wicked" is a popular musical based on the book by Gregory Maguire and inspired by the classic story "The Wizard of Oz." It tells the story of two witches, Elphaba and Glinda, and their friendship before Dorothy arrives in Oz. The musical explores their different personalities and how they deal with the wizard's unfair rule. It started on Broadway in 2003 and has been very successful, winning many awards and making a lot of money. A movie version is coming out in 2024 and 2025, directed by Jon M. Chu.
title: Wicked (musical)
